derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English cowper, from Middle Dutch, Middle Low German kūper, from kūpe 'tub, vat', based on Latin cupa. Compare with coop

entry.def: A cooper is a person who makes barrels.

means.word_mean: 1. a craftsman who makes or repairs wooden barrels or tubs
